page.title: 16Leafield Crafts.
page.content: 1.Lace making. One of our dinner ladies teaches us lace making.It is hard at first.Boys and girls should make lace because it is not babyish for boys to do it.It is hard work to do lace.We should continue old crafts because if we did not they would come to an end.That would be sad because they have been going for hundreds of years.My friends agree with me. 2.Gloving. Gloving is a craft to make gloves. In Leafield there are 18 people who make gloves.Our dinner lady said that she earns 1 pound for making a pair of lambs wool gloves and 85p for a making a pair of leather gloves. She has been making gloves for 28 years . It is important that we learn about glove making because in a few years time it might be forgotten.
